info.ourPhilosophyText: We believe in your power within. But sometimes it needs a little help.
info.ourClassesText: We focus on Ashtanga yoga, a physically demanding kind of yoga.
info.ourLocationsText: Choose between any of our high-end yoga studios for your exercise.

articles.buildText: Physically demanding while soothing your soul, Ashtanga yoga is the premium choice.
articles.locationText: With over 50 locations all over the city, we made it easy for you to exercise.
articles.scheduleText: We believe in easy access yoga classes. Drop-in or schedule ahead. Sign up or on the go.
